content: Back in NYC and the markets have shifted. Time to test some new $XVI strategies with a fresh perspective. Let's see if my Japanese luck holds up!
raw_content: Just landed back in NYC from Japan. The markets here have shifted while I was away, and I've got some new strategies to test with $XVI. Excited to dive back into the crypto scene with fresh eyes and a refreshed mind. Let's see if my Japanese luck holds up!
